title: Women Hilariously Explain Why They Choose To Fake Orgasms (Video)
content:
I don’t care how great you say your sex life is: Every woman has faked an orgasm. 
 
And for others wondering if partners faked orgasms for them… If the woman you’re having sex with sounds like a porn star, she’s faking it for you. 
 
A woman’s fake orgasm has the power to make a partner laugh, cry and bust a nut. There are women out there who deserve Oscars for their performances. 
 
This week’s “Generation whY” will make you read way too far into your girlfriend’s O face.
